body: Also, the number 1 is on the title. Does this mean this simply the first chapter? It's almost 2 years now since this was posted here, where's the 2nd chapter?

This is hot. Why hasn't anyone translated this yet? To English that is. For some reason it's always the Chinese who are translating the good stuff to their language. Seriously, you have so many translated works about ugly bastards and shotas but nobody is translating the actual good stuff.
Havent read it, but the tittle made laugh for a while
